alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, eastern Baker, west central Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Macclenny, or 19 miles southwest of Callahan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bryceville, Baldwin, Jacksonville Heights and Whitehouse Air Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
